title: About Us
description:
Factory Hunt is a supplier search engine & B2B platform where businesses can be connected each other.

Any manufacturer/supplier can create a website and online product catalog for free. Once a website/catalog is created, the information will be displayed in search results. Factory Hunt is the easiest way to showcase products to potential business partners.
Our mission is to make a free website for every suppliers in the world and make it easy to connect businesses. As a platform, we will continue to develop services to help businesses and discover new opportunities.
Best regards,
Factory Hunt Team
